meanings.definition: A muscle that serves to extend or straighten a part of the body, such as a limb.
meanings.sent1: The extensor in my leg helps me kick a soccer ball.
meanings.sent2: She felt a strain in her extensor after doing too many leg lifts.
meanings.sent3: The extensor muscle decided to take a break during the exercise.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like an unstoppable extensor, pushing him forward.
meanings.sent5: The extensor muscle works like a rubber band, stretching and contracting.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism that extends or stretches something.
meanings.sent1: The extensor on the telescope allowed him to see the stars clearly.
meanings.sent2: The extensor on the ladder helped him reach the high shelf.
meanings.sent3: The extensor gadget made the task much easier and faster.
meanings.sent4: Her patience acted as an extensor, extending the deadline for the project.
meanings.sent5: The extensor tool worked like magic, stretching the fabric effortlessly.
